tweet3.title: There be Witches Among Us
tweet3.content: It is with deepest regret that I inform You. There are Witches in this very Congregation.

tweet2.title: Please pray for Ruth!
tweet2.content: Ruth, our only child is not well! Her eyes remain open, yet she will not move.

tweet1.title: Any Advice Mr. Hale?
tweet1.content:
@RevHale My Betty won't wake from her slumber.
What do you suggest?
